Conteudo: Brasília - Having the majority of the members of the Committee discussed the possibility of reducing the basic interest rate already in this meeting, in a context of macroeconomic environment that continues to be surrounded by great uncertainty, the Copom unanimously decided to still maintain the Selic target at 13.75% p. a., without bias, at this moment. The Committee will carefully monitor the evolution of the inflation forward-looking scenario aiming at timely defining the next steps of its monetary policy strategy.The Portuguese version of the December Copom Minutes will be released next Thursday, December 18.
